General.Name: Sequoia Logística e Transportes S.A
General.Description: Sequoia Logística e Transportes S.A. provides logistics, warehouse, transportation, supply chain, and operation management services. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Embu Das Artes, Brazil.
General.Address: Avenida Isaltino Victor de Moraes, Embu Das Artes, SP, Brazil, 06806-400
